Description:
Skills:
- Excellent communication skills to interact with customers and understand their laundry requirements.
- Strong organizational skills efficiently manage multiple laundry orders and ensure timely delivery.
- Attention to detail to accurately record and process laundry requests.
- Ability to handle cash transactions and maintain an accurate of payments.
- Basic computer skills operate laundry management software and maintain customer profiles.
- Time management skills to prioritize laundry tasks and meet deadlines.
- Physical stamina to handle long hours of standing and lifting heavy laundry bags.
- Problem-solving skills to resolve customer complaints or escalate issues to the supervisor.
- Flexibility to work in shifts and weekends as per the business needs.
- Knowledge of different fabrics, care instructions, and laundry techniques to provide appropriate service to customers.Job Details
